ygData.subject: Re: Our spell abilities
ygData.msgSnippet: I love playing my SK, and have had no desire to play any other race. But, I do agree that we really got the short end of the stick when it comes to spells. If
ygData.messageBody:
I love playing my SK, and have had no desire to play any other race. But, I do
agree that we really got the short end of the stick when it comes to spells. If
Harm Touch could not be resisted I would not mind the other shortcomings. But as
Jorval stated, traveling is a real pain. I have gotten killed by more Innkeepers
than any other type of NPC in the game. In fact, the last 3 times I have died (the
only 3 this week) it was by an Innkeeper who must have saw me through a wall and
proceeded to open a can of whoop ass on me. Now, don't get me wrong, I expected
the SK character to be a hard one, and the reward of actually achieving a high
level will be a greater accomplishment to me than playing any other race, but for
God's sake, at least give us some type of invisible spell. Anyway I am rambling.
Besides that, the SK has been fun to play, even with its shortcomings ( I'm always
breaking the monotony for my group by the occasional Zone Run from an
Innkeeper...they get a good laugh out of it.) I just wish they would just give us
at least 1 useful spell like invis and make the Harm Touch a no save spell.

Jorval, I play on CZ also...I think I helped you kill Lady Shae a couple times,
but not sure. I've moved to Qeynos, so if you ever in the area, give me a tell.

Reanin 13th level Human SK

JACKiam1@... wrote:

> From: JACKiam1@...
>
> I think harm touch and lay on hands are pretty damn unbalanced myself. I been
> harm touch in theory is friggin, great, especially at lower levels. But as
> people get higher levels say level 30, to times 30 giving a 300hp harmtouch
> is in now way going to be as worthwhile as lay on hands giving a level 30
> Paladin their 700-800 odd hp back! What's more, harmtouch CAN be resisted
> either totaly or partialy. Also on the EQlizer site, it says basically that
> the lev 15 spells we get aren't all that useful. That said we are supposidly
> 3/4 warrior and 1/4 necro <g> but perhaps we should get a lil more power for
> being SO damn neglected by society, and we dont even have inviso to visit
> those exotic locations as the necros do!
>
> tell me what ya think and appologies for typos, im not proofreading im tired
> : P
>
> Jorval Human Level 13 Shadowknight, Cazic Thule
>
